https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2jf3XauB7d1kOtQgzNzyNu71NAh.jpg Despite the life threat hanging over his head, St√©phane decides to go back to Corsica for the funeral of Christophe, a childhood friend and companion in arms, murdered the day before. On this occasion, the chain of events which made him, the learned petit-bourgeois from Bastia, shift from delinquency to political radicalization and then to clandestinity, comes back to his mind. A Violent Life
